name: Yusuf Ali
text: Ya Sin.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: By the Qur'an, full of Wisdom,-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thou art indeed one of the messengers,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: On a Straight Way.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It is a Revelation sent down by (Him), the Exalted in Might, Most Merciful.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: In order that thou mayest admonish a people, whose fathers had received no admonition, and who therefore remain heedless (of the Signs of Allah).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The Word is proved true against the greater part of them: for they do not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have put yokes round their necks right up to their chins, so that their heads are forced up (and they cannot see).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We have put a bar in front of them and a bar behind them, and further, We have covered them up; so that they cannot see.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The same is it to them whether thou admonish them or thou do not admonish them: they will not believe.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Thou canst but admonish such a one as follows the Message and fears the (Lord) Most Gracious, unseen: give such a one, therefore, good tidings, of Forgiveness and a Reward most generous.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily We shall give life to the dead, and We record that which they send before and that which they leave behind, and of all things have We taken account in a clear Book (of evidence).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Set forth to them, by way of a parable, the (story of) the Companions of the City. Behold!, there came messengers to it.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When We (first) sent to them two messengers, they rejected them: But We strengthened them with a third: they said, "Truly, we have been sent on a mission to you."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The (people) said: "Ye are only men like ourselves; and (Allah) Most Gracious sends no sort of revelation: ye do nothing but lie."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Our Lord doth know that we have been sent on a mission to you:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And our duty is only to proclaim the clear Message."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The (people) said: "for us, we augur an evil omen from you: if ye desist not, we will certainly stone you. And a grievous punishment indeed will be inflicted on you by us."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They said: "Your evil omens are with yourselves: (deem ye this an evil omen). If ye are admonished? Nay, but ye are a people transgressing all bounds!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then there came running, from the farthest part of the City, a man, saying, "O my people! Obey the messengers:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Obey those who ask no reward of you (for themselves), and who have themselves received Guidance.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "It would not be reasonable in me if I did not serve Him Who created me, and to Whom ye shall (all) be brought back.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Shall I take (other) gods besides Him? If (Allah) Most Gracious should intend some adversity for me, of no use whatever will be their intercession for me, nor can they deliver me.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "I would indeed, if I were to do so, be in manifest Error.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "For me, I have faith in the Lord of you (all): listen, then, to me!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It was said: "Enter thou the Garden." He said: "Ah me! Would that my People knew (what I know)!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "For that my Lord has granted me Forgiveness and has enrolled me among those held in honour!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We sent not down against his People, after him, any hosts from heaven, nor was it needful for Us so to do.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It was no more than a single mighty Blast, and behold! they were (like ashes) quenched and silent.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Ah! Alas for (My) Servants! There comes not a messenger to them but they mock him!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: See they not how many generations before them we destroyed? Not to them will they return:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: But each one of them all - will be brought before Us (for judgment).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: A Sign for them is the earth that is dead: We do give it life, and produce grain therefrom, of which ye do eat.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We produce therein orchard with date-palms and vines, and We cause springs to gush forth therein:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: That they may enjoy the fruits of this (artistry): It was not their hands that made this: will they not then give thanks?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Glory to Allah, Who created in pairs all things that the earth produces, as well as their own (human) kind and (other) things of which they have no knowledge.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And a Sign for them is the Night: We withdraw therefrom the Day, and behold they are plunged in darkness;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the sun runs his course for a period determined for him: that is the decree of (Him), the Exalted in Might, the All-Knowing.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And the Moon,- We have measured for her mansions (to traverse) till she returns like the old (and withered) lower part of a date-stalk.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It is not permitted to the Sun to catch up the Moon, nor can the Night outstrip the Day: Each (just) swims along in (its own) orbit (according to Law).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And a Sign for them is that We bore their race (through the Flood) in the loaded Ark;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And We have created for them similar (vessels) on which they ride.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If it were Our Will, We could drown them: then would there be no helper (to hear their cry), nor could they be delivered,

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Except by way of Mercy from Us, and by way of (world) convenience (to serve them) for a time.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: When they are told, "Fear ye that which is before you and that which will be after you, in order that ye may receive Mercy," (they turn back).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Not a Sign comes to them from among the Signs of their Lord, but they turn away therefrom.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And when they are told, "Spend ye of (the bounties) with which Allah has provided you," the Unbelievers say to those who believe: "Shall we then feed those whom, if Allah had so willed, He would have fed, (Himself)?- Ye are in nothing but manifest error."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Further, they say, "When will this promise (come to pass), if what ye say is true?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They will not (have to) wait for aught but a single Blast: it will seize them while they are yet disputing among themselves!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: No (chance) will they then have, by will, to dispose (of their affairs), nor to return to their own people!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: The trumpet shall be sounded, when behold! from the sepulchres (men) will rush forth to their Lord!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They will say: "Ah! Woe unto us! Who hath raised us up from our beds of repose?"... (A voice will say:) "This is what (Allah) Most Gracious had promised. And true was the word of the messengers!"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: It will be no more than a single Blast, when lo! they will all be brought up before Us!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Then, on that Day, not a soul will be wronged in the least, and ye shall but be repaid the meeds of your past Deeds.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily the Companions of the Garden shall that Day have joy in all that they do;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They and their associates will be in groves of (cool) shade, reclining on Thrones (of dignity);

name: Yusuf Ali
text: (Every) fruit (enjoyment) will be there for them; they shall have whatever they call for;

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Peace!" - a word (of salutation) from a Lord Most Merciful!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And O ye in sin! Get ye apart this Day!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Did I not enjoin on you, O ye Children of Adam, that ye should not worship Satan; for that he was to you an enemy avowed?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "And that ye should worship Me, (for that) this was the Straight Way?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "But he did lead astray a great multitude of you. Did ye not, then, understand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "This is the Hell of which ye were (repeatedly) warned!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Embrace ye the (fire) this Day, for that ye (persistently) rejected (Truth)."

name: Yusuf Ali
text: That Day shall We set a seal on their mouths. But their hands will speak to us, and their feet bear witness, to all that they did.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If it had been our Will, We could surely have blotted out their eyes; then should they have run about groping for the Path, but how could they have seen?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And if it had been Our Will, We could have transformed them (to remain) in their places; then should they have been unable to move about, nor could they have returned (after error).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: If We grant long life to any, We cause him to be reversed in nature: Will they not then understand?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: We have not instructed the (Prophet) in Poetry, nor is it meet for him: this is no less than a Message and a Qur'an making things clear:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: That it may give admonition to any (who are) alive, and that the charge may be proved against those who reject (Truth).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: See they not that it is We Who have created for them - among the things which Our hands have fashioned - cattle, which are under their dominion?-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And that We have subjected them to their (use)? of them some do carry them and some they eat:

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And they have (other) profits from them (besides), and they get (milk) to drink. Will they not then be grateful?

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Yet they take (for worship) gods other than Allah, (hoping) that they might be helped!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: They have not the power to help them: but they will be brought up (before Our Judgment-seat) as a troop (to be condemned).

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Let not their speech, then, grieve thee. Verily We know what they hide as well as what they disclose.

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Doth not man see that it is We Who created him from sperm? yet behold! he (stands forth) as an open adversary!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: And he makes comparisons for Us, and forgets his own (origin and) Creation: He says, "Who can give life to (dry) bones and decomposed ones (at that)?"

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Say, "He will give them life Who created them for the first time! for He is Well-versed in every kind of creation!-

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "The same Who produces for you fire out of the green tree, when behold! ye kindle therewith (your own fires)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: "Is not He Who created the heavens and the earth able to create the like thereof?" - Yea, indeed! for He is the Creator Supreme, of skill and knowledge (infinite)!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: Verily, when He intends a thing, His Command is, "be", and it is!

name: Yusuf Ali
text: So glory to Him in Whose hands is the dominion of all things: and to Him will ye be all brought back.
